actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the United States District Court for the Central District of California may be held at Long Beach.

summary.text: Provides that the United States District Court for the Central District of California shall be held at Long Beach, California, in addition to Los Angeles, as currently provided.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the United States District Court for the Central District of California may be held at Long Beach.
